long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookie Clicker - Xmas Cookie Clicker is an engaging game available as a Chrome Extension. It is also accessible for free on the website unblockedgames.ee. In this game, players are tasked with clicking on cookies to earn points and unlock various upgrades and achievements. The Christmas-themed version adds a festive twist with holiday-themed cookies and decorations.

The objective of the game is to accumulate as many cookies as possible by continuously clicking on the large cookie in the center of the screen. Each click earns a certain number of cookies, which can be used to purchase upgrades such as grandmas, factories, and more. These upgrades increase the number of cookies generated per second, allowing players to earn cookies even when they are not actively clicking.

As players progress, they can unlock special cookie types and bonuses that provide additional benefits. The game also features a prestige system, where players can reset their progress in exchange for "Heavenly Chips," which can be used to purchase powerful upgrades that boost cookie production even further.

"Cookie Clicker - Xmas Cookie Clicker" offers a simple yet addictive gameplay experience that can be enjoyed during breaks or leisure time. With its festive theme and endless cookie-clicking fun, it's a delightful game for players of all ages.

Note: We add "More Games" in the Popup shows other game links, making it easier for players to quickly access the game by clicking on the game on the top left of the popup window go up. And on our website https://unblockedgames.ee/
